WEATHER FORECAST FOR 20 JULY 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 19 July 2024
The prevailing windy conditions over the island are expected to continue further, due to the active South-
west Monsoonal condition.
Showery condition over the island is expected to reduce during the next few days.
